attributes.action: Add fairy lights to every classroom in the entire United Kingdom.
attributes.additional_details: Because my teachers won't do it
attributes.background: To fund every school and enforce that the fairy lights are being added.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for. 
 
Decisions about putting up fairy lights in school classrooms are a matter for individual teachers, not the UK Government or Parliament.
